about_the_game:
You can support the development of Escape Memoirs: Mini Stories by purchasing this DLC. It unlocks various comments from both of the developers that can be found in the game world. These comments range from game design insights to behind the scenes anecdotes.

Thank you for your support.

Note: The developer comments contain minor spoilers for some of the puzzles. It is recommended you play through the game before reading them. The comments can be turned on/off from the in-game pause menu.

IMPORTANT: This DLC does NOT unlock any additional scenarios.
